vote.title: To Recognize and Support the Mission of the Ohio Commission for The United States Semiquincentennial (AMERICA250-OH)
vote.description:
Title
To Recognize and Support the Mission of the Ohio Commission for The United States Semiquincentennial (AMERICA250-OH)
 
WHEREAS, the Ohio legislature and Governor created AMERICA250-OH in 2018 to plan, encourage, develop and coordinate the commemoration of the semiquincentennial (250th) anniversary of the United States.
 
WHEREAS, AMERICA250-OH celebrates Ohio’s integral role in that event and the role of its people on the nation’s past, present, and future.
 
WHEREAS, AMERICA250-OH hopes to engage ALL 88 counties through their many signature and officially recognized programs, projects and events over the next several years by inspiring future leaders.
 
WHEREAS, AMERICA250-OH celebrates all the contributions Ohioans have made to the nation over the last 250 years; and 
 
WHEREAS, by adoption of the AMERICA250-OH Resolution we hope to educate, preserve, innovate, and celebrate every Ohioan in every county. NOW, THEREFORE
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
That this Council does hereby endorse AMERICA250-OH and their mission to educate, preserve, innovate and celebrate EVERY Ohioan in EVERY county and will participate in the celebration of the United States Semiquincentennial.
